doctor.name: Dr. Md. Siddiqur Rahman Sohel
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Siddiqur Rahman Sohel is a Kidney Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Nephrology). He is a Assistant Professor, Nephrology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Siddiqur Rahman Sohel at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 3pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Safayet Hossain Pramanik
doctor.info: Dr. Safayet Hossain Pramanik is a Nephrologist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Nephrology), MACP (USA). He is a Consultant (Nephrology) at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Safayet Hossain Pramanik at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 2.30pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Nasir Uddin
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Nasir Uddin is a Nephrologist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Nephrology). He is a Consultant (Nephrology) at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Nasir Uddin at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 2pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
